name: tastefully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows style and quality and is not likely to offend anyone: tastefully decorated They handled the love scene tastefully. See
tasteful
More examplesFewer examplesIf it is tastefully done, I do not see that anyone could object.The room had many tastefully arranged antiques.She paints people without clothes on, but she does it tastefully.
